name: Spirythm
description:
EVEN THO IT'S TECHNICALLY PLAYABLE ON BROWSER, THE SOUND MIGHT BE HORRIBLE. You can download the game below if you want a better experience.

I wanted to learn how a rythm game was made, so I tried making one :)

=========================================

PITCH (/things you should know about)

Catch Blue tiles to gain score. They will also let you shoot after some time.

Shoot on Red tiles to gain even more score. But be careful not touching them or you will lose health !

/!\ Don't forget you can still move while waiting for a shot !

=========================================

CONTROLS

A/D - Left/Right == Move Left/Right

=========================================

Music made by a friend :D
